text:
="preserve">Bedok MRT Station (EW5) is an MRT Station in Singapore. It is along the East West MRT Line.
Underpasses connect the station to both sides of the road. The station also links to Bedok Mall and the Bedok Bus Interchange.
Following stations.
Previous: Tanah Merah (EW4)Next: Kembangan (EW6)
Former codes.
Formerly the code was: E8 (1989 - 2001)
